findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Function
findings.description: A non-whitelisted wallet can transfer a specified number of tokens.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: burn
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected swap functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions (e.g., swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, etc.) are present in the contract, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: The 'skim' function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected sync Function
findings.description: The sync function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: <Constructor>
findings.description: The constructor function has unrestricted access.

findings.title: safeLaunch_Blacklist_ADD
findings.description: The safeLaunch_Blacklist_ADD function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: safeLaunch_Blacklist_REMOVE
findings.description: The safeLaunch_Blacklist_REMOVE function allows the removal of addresses from a blacklist, which may lead to unintended access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected Function 'deliver'
findings.description: The 'deliver' function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: _approve
findings.description: Potential vulnerability found in _approve function.

findings.title: _transfer
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in _transfer function

findings.title: Unprotected swapTokens Function
findings.description: The swapTokens function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to perform token swaps.

findings.title: buyBackTokens
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: swapTokensForEth
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: swapETHForTokens
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: increaseAllowance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Decrease Allowance Vulnerability
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a permission issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: includeInReward
findings.description: The includeInReward function has a vulnerability due to its external access and onlyOwner restriction.
